sources.title: Step On It (1936) RICHARD TALMADGE
sources.description:
PizzaFLIX Presents Classic Movie Monday
Starring: Richard Talmadge, Lois Wilde, Roger Williams
Director: Henr√≠ Samuels (aka Harry S. Webb)

When a motorcycle cop is unfairly fired from the force after arresting a speeding heiress, he attempts to solve a string of truck hijackings to clear his name.

TRIVIA: Richard Talmadge, born Sylvester Ricardo Metzetti, was a member of the Flying Metzettis, a family of acrobats renowned for originating the quadruple back somersault!
